metadata.title: CVE-2023-45236 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: EDK2's Network Package is susceptible to a predictable TCP Initial SequenceNumber. This vulnerability can be exploited by an attacker to gainunauthorized access and potentially lead to a loss of Confidentiality.

criterions.comment: edk2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
